Movies.title: Spider-Man
Movies.description: Peter Parker is bitten by a Spider and given Superpowers. Has a crush on Mary Jane. Loses Uncle Ben and take it upon himself to fight crime. Fights Green Goblin who is Norman Osborn

Movies.title: Spider-Man 2
Movies.description: Peter's life is falling apart due to being a superhero and Mary Jane is engaged to someone else. Fights Doctor Octopus (Doc Ock) who is Dr. Otto Octavius after a failed fusion experiment

Movies.title: Spider-Man 3
Movies.description: Peter gets the girl of his dreams (Mary Jane). However, Harry Osborn finds out Peter killed his father (Norman Osborn). Putting their difference aside they team up to fight Eddie Brock embued with the powers from Venom and Flint Marko (Sandman)

Movies.title: The Amazing Spider-man
Movies.description: Bascially a rewrite of Spider-man with Andrew Garfield as Spider-man who fights Dr. Curt Connors (The Lizard), a scientist at Oscorp

Movies.title: The Amazing Spider-man 2
Movies.description: Peter has a hard time finding balance between Peter Parker and Spider-man. Facing a more powerful foe this time, Electro. And the death of a loved one...

Movies.title: Spider-man: Homecoming
Movies.description: Peter Parker played by Tom Holland. Is taken under Tony Stark's wing and fights Vulture who has acquired technology from the Chitauri

Movies.title: Spider-man: Far From Home
Movies.description: On a school field trip to Europe. Peter is tricked into giving E.D.I.T.H to Quentin Beck (Mysterio) subsequently giving access to Stark industries technology. Spider-man's identity is also revealed to the world.

Movies.title: Spider-man: No Way Home
Movies.description: One of the best Spider-man movies ever released. WARNING: Spoilers! Trying to undo the news of the identity of Spider-man as Peter Parker. Seeking Dr.Strange's powers to undo the news, a spell is casted breaking the fabric of the multiverse and bringing in the villians of the past. Seeking help Tobey Maguire, Andrew Garfield and Tom Holland all suit up as Spider-man to fight enemies of old.
